Package Mark

Class MarksUI

  • java.lang.Object
    • Mark.MarksUI
  • public class MarksUI
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents the user interface for marks, where users can input command and outputs are displayed

    2018-11-15
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Nam
